org.gearvrf.animation

Class GVRTransformAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.animation.GVRAnimation
      • org.gearvrf.animation.GVRTransformAnimation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GVRPositionAnimation, GVRRelativeMotionAnimation, GVRRotationByAxisAnimation, GVRRotationByAxisWithPivotAnimation, GVRScaleAnimation

    public abstract class GVRTransformAnimation
extends GVRAnimation
    Animate a GVRTransform. The constructors cast their target parameter to a protected final GVRTransform mTransform field.

      protected GVRTransformAnimation(GVRHybridObject target, float duration)
      Deprecated. 
      Using this overload reduces 'constructor fan-out' and thus makes your life a bit easier - but at the cost of replacing compile-time type checking with run-time type checking, which is more expensive and can miss errors in code if you don't test every path through your code.
      protected GVRTransformAnimation(GVRSceneObject target, float duration)
      Sets the protected final GVRTransform mTransform field without doing any runtime checks.
      protected GVRTransformAnimation(GVRTransform target, float duration)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GVRTransformAnimation

        protected GVRTransformAnimation(GVRHybridObject target,
                                float duration)
        Deprecated. Using this overload reduces 'constructor fan-out' and thus makes your life a bit easier - but at the cost of replacing compile-time type checking with run-time type checking, which is more expensive and can miss errors in code if you don't test every path through your code.
        Sets the protected final GVRTransform mTransform field.
        Parameters:
        target - May be a GVRTransform or a GVRSceneObject - does runtime checks.
        duration - The animation duration, in seconds.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If target is neither a GVRTransform nor a GVRSceneObject

      • GVRTransformAnimation

        protected GVRTransformAnimation(GVRTransform target,
                                float duration)
        Sets the protected final GVRTransform mTransform field without doing any runtime checks.
        Parameters:
        target - GVRTransform to animate.
        duration - The animation duration, in seconds.

      • GVRTransformAnimation

        protected GVRTransformAnimation(GVRSceneObject target,
                                float duration)
        Sets the protected final GVRTransform mTransform field without doing any runtime checks.

        This constructor is included to be orthogonal ;-) but you probably won't use it, as most derived classes will have final fields of their own to set. Rather than replicate the final field setting code, the best pattern is to write a 'master' constructor, and call it via this(getTransform(target), duration), ...); - see GVRRotationByAxisAnimation.GVRRotationByAxisAnimation(GVRSceneObject, float, float, float, float, float) for an example.

        Parameters:
        target - GVRSceneObject containing a GVRTransform
        duration - The animation duration, in seconds.

    • Method Detail

      • getTransform

        protected static GVRTransform getTransform(GVRSceneObject sceneObject)
        'Knows how' to get a transform from a scene object - protects you from any changes (however unlikely) in the object hierarchy.
